name: CVE-2021-22883
description: Node.js before 10.24.0, 12.21.0, 14.16.0, and 15.10.0 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack when too many connection attempts with an 'unknownProtocol' are established. This leads to a leak of file descriptors. If a file descriptor limit is configured on the system, then the server is unable to accept new connections and prevent the process also from opening, e.g. a file. If no file descriptor limit is configured, then this lead to an excessive memory usage and cause the system to run out of memory.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:-:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:32:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:33:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:34:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:e-series_performance_analyzer:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:peoplesoft_enterprise_peopletools:8.58:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:graalvm:20.3.1.2:*:*:*:enterprise:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:graalvm:21.0.0.2:*:*:*:enterprise:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:graalvm:19.3.5:*:*:*:enterprise:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:nosql_database:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_cluster:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:peoplesoft_enterprise_peopletools:8.59:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:jd_edwards_enterpriseone_tools:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
